addProperty.question: How do I add a new property?
addProperty.answer: To add a new property, navigate to the Properties section in the sidebar and click on the 'Add Property' button. Fill out the property details form and click 'Create Property' to save it.

manageUsers.question: How do I manage user accounts?
manageUsers.answer: You can manage user accounts by going to the Users & Agents section. From there, you can view, edit, or delete user accounts, as well as change user roles and permissions.

processPayments.question: How do I process payments?
processPayments.answer: Payments can be processed through the Payments section. Make sure you have configured your payment gateway in the Settings > Integrations page before processing payments.

exportData.question: How do I export property data?
exportData.answer: To export property data, go to the Properties section, select the properties you want to export using the checkboxes, and click on the 'Export' button in the actions menu.

emailNotifications.question: How do I set up email notifications?
emailNotifications.answer: Email notifications can be configured in the Settings > Notifications page. You can choose which events trigger email notifications and customize the email templates.
